title: The Rebuke Of The Churches In Revelation | Unapologetic 81
itunes:title: The Rebuke Of The Churches In Revelation | Unapologetic 81
description: There is a lot of mystery surrounding the book of Revelation. Some of that has to do with Old Testament symbolism and how or if there is an application to us today. We focus on the seven churches as we dive into this episode.
